title: Remove all languages except English, Simplified Chinese, and Traditional Chinese

requirements.text: Remove all language options except English (en), Simplified Chinese (zh-CN), and Traditional Chinese (zh-TW) from the LanguageSelection component

quotes: 现在只保留英语 简体中文跟繁体中文的语言  其他语言全部删除

acceptanceCriteria: LanguageSelection component displays exactly 3 language options: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
All other language options (Spanish, French, Japanese, Korean, German, Arabic, Portuguese, Russian, Italian, Dutch, Hindi, Turkish, Polish) are removed from the UI

requirements.text: Remove all language options except English (en), Simplified Chinese (zh-CN), and Traditional Chinese (zh-TW) from the LanguageSwitcher component

quotes: 现在只保留英语 简体中文跟繁体中文的语言  其他语言全部删除

acceptanceCriteria: LanguageSwitcher dropdown menu shows exactly 3 language options
Only English, Simplified Chinese, and Traditional Chinese are selectable

requirements.text: Update the Language type enum in frontend/src/types.ts to include only 'en', 'zh-CN', and 'zh-TW', removing all other language codes

quotes: 现在只保留英语 简体中文跟繁体中文的语言  其他语言全部删除

acceptanceCriteria: Language enum contains exactly 3 values: en, zh-CN, zh-TW
All other language codes are removed from the type definition

requirements.text: Remove translation objects for all languages except English (en), Simplified Chinese (zh-CN), and Traditional Chinese (zh-TW) from the translations file

quotes: 现在只保留英语 简体中文跟繁体中文的语言  其他语言全部删除

acceptanceCriteria: Translation data structure contains only 3 language objects: en, zh-CN, zh-TW
All translation objects for removed languages are deleted

constraints: Do not modify any code outside of language selection and translation systems
Preserve all existing functionality for the 3 retained languages
Do not modify any components other than LanguageSelection, LanguageSwitcher, types.ts, and translation files
nonGoals: Adding new translations or improving existing translations
Changing language switching behavior or persistence logic
Modifying any quest management, authentication, or other application features
